content.rendered: André Andersson was a partner in the firm for 27 years (1994-2020). During this period he played a fundamental role in establishing the leading position of the firm’s banking practice. For twenty years he chaired the firm’s Banking and Finance practice group. In addition to this, André Andersson has been active in developing the firm’s international relations and was for more than ten years Global Relationship Partner. He continues with the firm as Senior Advisor, with a special focus on structuring and development projects in the financial sector. With more than thirty years’ experience, André Andersson has extensive knowledge and the ability to develop innovative solutions to complicated problems. As Senior Advisor he will also continue to work with the firm’s international and academic relations.
